p: Figure 2 illustrates the frequency and spatial distribution, while Fig. 3 are maps showing the infectious disease-causing agent responsible for the epidemic or the public health emergencies in 2016, 2017 and 2018. Fig. 4 is a stacked chart of all the epidemics by disease for each country where an epidemic was reported, and Fig. 5 is a stacked chart of other public health emergencies by event that occurred during 2016–2018 in the countries of the WHO African region.
